entry.dcterms:description: the most important characteristics of families receiving support, their types of income
entry.dcterms:subject: family life, marriage, relationship
social welfare policy and systems
social conditions and indicators
document
administrative records
time-series

Non-representative sample. Experimental data collection based on a computer register registration. Registration data from 56 local self-governments were used. From each county 1-1 city and village can also be found in the sample.
Summary of administrative records.
C
